title: Double-Sided Umbrella

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give two players half of a double-sided umbrella each night. The first player will be redirected to the second, and vice versa.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may self-target even though that doesn't do anything.

desc:
Post 3674
*It protects you in case it's raining from the ground.*
